sum_bart: Sigachi Industries Limited (“Company”) is pleased to announce that it has received Environmental Clearance (EC) for its upcoming Greenfield manufacturing facility at Bharuch, Gujarat. A press release to this extent is enclosed.
sum_peg: Dear Sir and Madam, I would like to inform you that Sigachi Industries Limited has filed its annual report for the financial year ended March 31, 2019 with the Securities and Exchange Board of India.
sum_t5: Sigachi Industries Limited is pleased to announce that its Dahej 2 SEZ facility has received Environmental Clearance (EC) from the competent regulatory authority. This development marks a significant milestone in Sigachi’s scale-up journey and operational diversification, reaffirming its commitment to strengthening global competitiveness through innovation, regulatory readiness, and customer -centricity.
